MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML1 area of Motherwell. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:52pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have now arrived on site and Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:31pm on Tuesday, 05 January 2021
